title: Apostle Islands National Lakeshore: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore          The Eastern National bookstore at the Old Courthouse Visitor Center in Bayfield carries a wide variety of books and other items relating to the Apostle Islands National Lakeshore. Eastern National aids and promotes the historical, scientific and educational activities of the National Park Service. It also supports the research, interpretation and conservation programs of the Service. As a not- for-profit cooperating association recognized by Congress, it makes interpretive material available to visitors and the general public. Visit Eastern National on-line for books and educational materials about the Apostle Islands.
